verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Praise the Lord! Praise the Lord! newline Let the earth hear His voice! newline Praise the Lord! Praise the Lord! newline Let the people rejoice! newline O come to the Father newline Through Jesus the Son; newline And give Him the glory, newline Great things He hath done!

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: To God be the glory! newline Great things He hath done! newline So lov'd He the world newline That He gave us His Son, newline Who yielded His life newline An atonement for sin, newline And open'd the lifegate newline That all may go in.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: O perfect redemption, the purchase of blood! newline To every believer the promise of God; newline The vilest offender who truly believes, newline That moment from Jesus a pardon receives.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Great things He hath taught us, newline Great things He hath done, newline And great our rejoicing through Jesus the Son: newline But purer and higher and greater will be newline Our wonder, our worship, when Jesus we see!
